Module com.example.dmscoursework
Package com.example.dmscoursework.Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.dmscoursework.Controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController is in charge of the game logic. The gameController will update the state of the gameBoard every 10 milliseconds by moving the ball as well to check and see if a player has specified whether to move the paddle left or right. The gameController is also in charge of allowing the AI play the game instead of the human player.
Since:
04-01-2022
Version:
1.0
Author:
William Michiel Simson van Dijkhuizen
